languages.text: "Ну может быть. Но зато после этого {rt_mf|его|ее} слуги достали мешок тронов и осыпали им бедняков там, где проходил{rt_mf||а} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}. Неужели не слышали?"

traits.locale_text: "Было. А после этого {mf|его|ее} слуги достали мешок тронов и осыпали им бедняков там, где проходил{mf||а} Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Неужели не слышали?"

languages.text: "Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"
languages.original_text: "Ну может быть. Но зато после этого {rt_mf|его|ее} слуги достали мешок тронов и осыпали им бедняков там, где проходил{rt_mf||а} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}. Неужели не слышали?"

traits.locale_text: "Well, it may have been. However, after that, {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

"Well, it may have been. However, after that, {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

"Well, it may have been. However, after that, {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

"Well, it may have been. However, after that, {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

"Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

"Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

languages.text: “事情可能确实是这样，但随后，{rt_mf|他|她}的仆人就取出了一个大袋子，里面装满了王座币。无论那位大人走到哪里，{rt_mf|他|她}的仆人都会把钱分给周围的穷人，你们没听说吗？”
languages.original_text: "Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

traits.locale_text: “事情可能确实是这样，但随后，{rt_mf|他|她}的仆人就取出了一个大袋子，里面装满了王座币。无论那位大人走到哪里，{rt_mf|他|她}的仆人都会把钱分给周围的穷人，你们没听说吗？”

languages.text: «Es posible. Sin embargo, fue entonces que sus sirvientes sacaron una bolsa llena de tronos y empezaron a repartirlos entre los pobres por dondequiera que pasaba {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial}. ¿No os habíais enterado?».
languages.original_text: "Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

traits.locale_text: «Es posible. Sin embargo, fue entonces que sus sirvientes sacaron una bolsa llena de tronos y empezaron a repartirlos entre los pobres por dondequiera que pasaba {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial}. ¿No os habíais enterado?».

languages.text: "Olabilir. Ancak tam o sırada hizmetkârları büyük bir taht kesesi çıkardı ve Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} her gittiği yerde fakirlere onları saçtı. Duymadınız mı?"
languages.original_text: "Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

traits.locale_text: "Olabilir. Ancak tam o sırada hizmetkârları büyük bir taht kesesi çıkardı ve Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} her gittiği yerde fakirlere onları saçtı. Duymadınız mı?"

languages.text: 「えっと、そうだったかもしれないわ。だけど、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が行く先々で、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の使用人が王の大きな鞄を取り出し、その中身を貧しい者たちにばらまいているわ。聞いたことないの？」
languages.original_text: "Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

traits.locale_text: 「えっと、そうだったかもしれないわ。だけど、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が行く先々で、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の使用人が王の大きな鞄を取り出し、その中身を貧しい者たちにばらまいているわ。聞いたことないの？」

languages.text: « Eh bien, c'est possible. Mais ses serviteurs ont sorti un gros sac de trônes et ont jeté des pièces aux pauvres partout où se rendait {rt_mf|la Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste. Vous n'étiez pas au courant ? »
languages.original_text: "Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, c'est possible. Mais ses serviteurs ont sorti un gros sac de trônes et ont jeté des pièces aux pauvres partout où se rendait {rt_mf|la Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste. Vous n'étiez pas au courant ? »

languages.text: "Tja, vielleicht. Allerdings haben {rt_mf|seine|ihre} Diener dann einen Sack Thronen geholt und die Armen damit überhäuft, egal, wohin {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} auch ging. Wusstet Ihr das nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Well, it may have been. However, that's when {rt_mf|his|her} servants pulled out a big bag of thrones and showered the poor with them wherever the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} went. Haven't you heard?"

traits.locale_text: "Tja, vielleicht. Allerdings haben {rt_mf|seine|ihre} Diener dann einen Sack Thronen geholt und die Armen damit überhäuft, egal, wohin {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} auch ging. Wusstet Ihr das nicht?"
